nodes.text: Harilin was an Acclamator-class assault ship serving as a frigate in the navy of the Galactic Empire, in service during the Galactic Civil War around the time of the Battle of Yavin. Equipped with a shield generator, engines, and a hyperdrive, it was armed with a proton torpedo launcher, concussion missile launcher, and turbolasers, as well as laser cannons. It carried several squadrons of TIE fighters and TIE bombers in its hangar.
The Harilin first appeared in the 2006 video game Star Wars: Empire at War, in which the name can be randomly applied to an Acclamator-class assault ship.
